meanings.definition: A type of white wine produced in the Frascati region of Italy.
meanings.sent1: I tried a new frascatis at the wine tasting event.
meanings.sent2: The frascatis paired perfectly with the seafood dish.
meanings.sent3: At the party, everyone wanted a taste of the frascatis.
meanings.sent4: The frascatis was like a refreshing breeze on a hot summer day.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the frascatis filled the room, enticing everyone to try it.

meanings.definition: The act of drinking or enjoying Frascati wine.
meanings.sent1: After a long day, I look forward to some relaxing frascatis.
meanings.sent2: She savored every sip of the frascatis, enjoying its smooth flavor.
meanings.sent3: His love for frascatis was evident as he raised his glass for another toast.
meanings.sent4: The frascatis flowed like a river of joy at the celebration.
meanings.sent5: The laughter and chatter filled the room as friends shared a bottle of frascatis.

meanings.definition: A person or thing from Frascati, Italy.
meanings.sent1: The frascatis greeted us warmly, showing us around their beautiful town.
meanings.sent2: She proudly displayed her collection of frascatis souvenirs.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous frascatis played a prank on the unsuspecting tourists.
meanings.sent4: In the distance, the frascatis hills stood like silent guardians of the town.
meanings.sent5: The frascatis craftsmanship was evident in every detail of the artwork.
